metadata.title: Unicorn Pink Glitter Blue Light Blocking Glasses for Kids Ages 5-12
features: DESIGNED BY KIDS: Are your kids tired of boring and typical blue light glasses? Well, we have them (and you) covered. Our sturdy silicone frames are lightweight with fun design that kids will want to wear

BLUE LIGHT FILTER: The new normal has our kids spending more time attending online school, watching screens, attending class via zoom, reading on an devices and playing video games. EZiis blue light glasses can filter harmful blue light from computer, tablet, phone and TV screens. Studies have shown that blue light from TVs, Phones, tables and video games can include visual fatigue, eyestrain and even headaches.
MORE FOR YOUR MONEY: Give your kids more than just regular boring blue light glasses. Let their personality shine through with these fun glitter unicorn glasses.
description: When it comes to your little one’s happiness and comfort, there’s no room for compromise.
Why is this product for you?

The EZiis kids blue light glasses were designed by kids to keep the little ones’ eyes safe and prevent eye fatigue, during overexposure to TV, computer, laptop, tablet or smartphone. The kid friendly designs are stylish and fashionable!
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "7.5 x 4.7 x 1.6 inches", "Item Weight": "2.39 ounces", "Manufacturer": "EZiis", "Date First Available": "August 1, 2020"}
